titles.title: Sacramento River National Recreation Area Act of 2006
A bill to establish the Sacramento River National Recreation Area in the State of California.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 9/14/2006--Introduced. Sacramento River National Recreation Area Act of 2006 - Establishes the Sacramento River National Recreation Area in California, consisting of specified public land in Tehama and Shasta Counties. Requires the development of a comprehensive plan for the long-range protection and management of such Area.
